name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Target Grid: B2B Contact Finder & AI Outreach

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This plugin acts like your super-powered magnifying glass! It helps you uncover valuable information about people on LinkedIn.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Looking to boost your LinkedIn outreach? 

TargetGrid is a Chrome extension that instantly reveals verified contact details and helps you connect effectively with AI generated messages. Perfect for sales professionals, recruiters, marketers, and job seekers. TargetGrid enhances your LinkedIn experience by providing you with the tools to find the right contacts and start meaningful conversations.


Key Features:

Instant B2B Contact Information: Access email addresses and phone numbers directly from LinkedIn profiles. Choose which details to reveal and only use credits when data is available.

AI Outreach Message Generation: Draft personalized emails, connection requests, and icebreakers in seconds. TargetGrid’s AI adapts to your role, whether you’re in sales, recruitment, or marketing, for messages that feel authentic.

Flexible for Various Roles: Designed for sales teams, hiring managers, freelancers, and job seekers, making LinkedIn outreach fast, efficient, and tailored to your goals.


Why Choose TargetGrid?

Save Time: No more manual data entry or generic messages. Access data instantly and let AI handle the personalization.

Increase Engagement: Get contact details and use TargetGrid’s AI composer to reach out with confidence and connect effectively.
Download TargetGrid from the Chrome Store and see how it can transform your LinkedIn networking and outreach.
